name: Truth or Dare Dirty Party.Game
description:
Spin the Bottle & make it Hot with TRUTH or DARE!!! - Naughty Game. "Truth or Dare" is Party, After Party couple and multiplayer game which involves either answering truth questions or doing a dare.

We have truth and dares like:
• Example (Dare): Run around the room imitating a monkey.
• Example (Truth): If you could be born again, who would you come back as?
& many others... Play the adventure!!

App Provides 2 Levels of Difficulty:-

1. Normal Mode
2. Hot Mode (For Adults only)


COUPLES:-
Discover our dares made especially for couples. Rediscover your partner and pass boundaries you never thought you would reach before.

MULTIPLAYER, PARTY or FRIENDS:-
We have created dares specifically for party, you are going to have an unforgettable night! Max 25 Multi-Players can play this game!

>> CONFIDENTIALITY:-
This app does not connect to the internet. The dares you are playing and those that your players create remain on your phone! No data is sent to our servers, your party stays within the Players only.

Download and Install the "Truth and Dare" Game and Make your After/Party Memorable.

You can subscribe for unlimited access to our full pro version and premium content.
